title: Fix the conda-build version that does not work recently
body:
Recently, without version locking, the conda-build version is 3.21, where conda build cannot start run for python 3.6, so the test in "conda / build-pytest-package-ubuntu" does not work

Therefore, I lock the version of conda-build to be 3.20.4, it works well as before

Add new cpu conda build dockerfile and Add new readme
body:
This PR has two purposes:

(i) Add a cpu conda build dockerfile, this is useful when the computer does not have gpu but we still want to build cpu package

(ii) Add new readme file on how to generate new conda packages

I encountered the conflict due to filename change, so I fix the filename conflict in this PR
